content: this is a free pdf 1 crochet pattern to make a cute flamingo unlock this free pdf pattern when you join my free weekly newsletter after you confirm your subscription you will be sent the pdf pattern for both this pattern as well as an avocado and donut pdf pattern after this you will be signed up to receive updates on newly released free crochet patterns from stringydingding this also includes new pattern releases tips every crocheter needs to know a chance to get free pdf patterns and free exclusive patterns relevant holiday patterns being a part of the newsletter group will give you to exclusive information that you wont want to miss as well as access to personal help from me to you anytime you need it 1 https //stringydingding com/flamingo-amigurumi-free-pdf-crochet-pattern-download/
